title: [BUG] libSkiaSharp.so does not have a 16 KB page size
body: XA0141: Android 16 will require 16 KB page sizes. The shared library 'libSkiaSharp.so' does not have a 16 KB page size. Please inform the authors of the NuGet package 'SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.Android' version '2.88.7', which contains 'runtimes/android-arm64/native/libSkiaSharp.so'. See https://developer.android.com/guide/practices/page-sizes for more details.
